document.full_text: an investigation into the transfer of norwegian development funds by the nobel laureate muhammad yunus from his grameen bank to another venture found no irregularities, the finance minister said monday.
document.title: asia: bangladesh: microlender cleared in norwegian case
lines_and_colors: an investigation into the transfer of norwegian development funds by the nobel laureate muhammad yunus from his grameen bank to another venture found no irregularities, the finance minister said monday.
